SqlMap.select: SELECT EXTENSION_LINE_NO ,FIXED_SHEET_FLG ,CONTENTS_ID ,CONTENTS_DV ,CONTENT_POSITION_X ,CONTENT_POSITION_Y FROM MST_SHEET MS INNER JOIN MST_CONTENT_VIEW MCV ON MS.CONTENTS_ID = MCV.CONTENTS_ID WHERE MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#
SqlMap.update: UPDATE MST_EMP SET ACCESS_TOKEN = #ACCESS_TOKEN# ,TOKEN_CREATE_DATE = #TOKEN_CREATE_DATE# WHERE EMP_NO = #EMP_NO#
SqlMap.select: SELECT ACCESS_TOKEN ,TOKEN_CREATE_DATE FROM MST_EMP EMP WHERE EMP.EMP_NO = #EMP_NO#
SELECT 'Vaild' FROM MST_EMP EMP WHERE ACCESS_TOKEN = #ACCESS_TOKEN#
